data.name: Out of Sight Demo
data.detailed_description: To co-op game fans who want a stealth-action experience. Out of Sight requires you to work together to solve puzzles and free other crew members by using special abilities and gadgets to outwit and escape the enemy aliens who have invaded your space station. Out of Sight takes the stealth genre and expands it into a co-op experience allowing you to play with a friend, family member, or partner exclusively.
data.about_the_game: To co-op game fans who want a stealth-action experience. Out of Sight requires you to work together to solve puzzles and free other crew members by using special abilities and gadgets to outwit and escape the enemy aliens who have invaded your space station. Out of Sight takes the stealth genre and expands it into a co-op experience allowing you to play with a friend, family member, or partner exclusively.
data.short_description: A co-op stealth action game built purely for two players. Play together IRL or invite your friend with Steam Remote Play Together. Sneak, lure, hack and trap your way past the alien space cult invasion, and solve intriguing puzzles to free you and your crewmates.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel i3 or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: intel HD graphics or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internet needed only for Remote Play
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Linux 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i3 or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: intel HD graphics or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internet needed only for Remote Play
